Description:
This hotel is located in Old Town. This town full of nature, volcanoes and sunsets, which will make guests forget all their problems. The property lies surrounded by coffee plantations and the Acatenango, Agua and Fuego volcanoes and is just a 5-minute walk from the restaurants, bars, nightspots, shops and tourist centre of Antigua Guatemala. With its buildings and monuments, and lots of cultural activities, art galleries and exhibitions, the Old Town is a well-kept secret. It is 10 minutes from a macadamia plantation, where is it possible to have a tour, 30 minutes from a wine-tasting tour and 2 hours' drive from the beach at Monte Rico.

Renovated in 2010 and set in privately owned grounds with 24-hour security, this charming, family-friendly property is a small hotel featuring colonial style. The hotel has wide corridors and comprises a total of 11 unique rooms, including 1 suite and 2 junior suites. It the perfect place from which to enjoy beautiful landscapes, and it offers a cosy family atmosphere. This hotel is ideal for those looking for a few days off, to spend in peace and tranquillity. Facilities on offer to guests include a lobby area with a 24-hour reception service, a currency exchange facility, a cafe, a breakfast room and wireless Internet access. They can also take advantage of the room service and there is parking available for those arriving by car.

The comfortable rooms welcome guests into a colonial-style environment. Each room offers beds dressed with local textiles and a private bathroom with a bathtub or a shower. The rooms are equipped with a hairdryer, a king-size or double bed, a direct dial telephone and a plasma TV, and feature either a balcony or a terrace.

The hotel provides sun loungers and parasols. Golf enthusiasts will find the La Réunion golf course just a 30-minute drive away.

Guests may select their continental breakfast from a buffet.
